sentences.en: At first they insisted the Football Association adjudicate between the claims of Everton and Liverpool.
sentences.cn: 起初他们坚持让英足总在利物浦和埃弗顿的哀求中作出裁决.

sentences.en: Feudal official sees it two speak plausibly and at length, adjudicate hard temporarily, catch calcaneal witness.
sentences.cn: 官府见它俩都振振有词, 一时难以判决, 便把脚后跟抓来作证人.

sentences.en: He has been asked to adjudicate in the disagreement between the city council and the citizens.
sentences.cn: 请他出面仲裁市议会和市民之间的分歧.

sentences.en: Jurisdiction determines which court system should properly adjudicate a case.
sentences.cn: 什么法院体系适合审判某一案件应由管辖权决定.

sentences.en: Magistrate may be paid expenses when adjudicate.
sentences.cn: 当作裁决时也许要支付治安法官的开支.

sentences.en: Now how are we to adjudicate among rival ontologies?
sentences.cn: 现在我们怎样在对立的本体论之间作出裁判 呢 ?

sentences.en: The Dean adjudicates any faculty disputes.
sentences.cn: 系主任裁决教师间的纠纷。

sentences.en: The international court of justice might be a suitable place to adjudicate claims.
sentences.cn: 国际法庭或许是对所有权作出裁决的合适之地。

sentences.en: Two websites really too too similar, adjudicate the result is forecasted very hard.
sentences.cn: 两家网站的确太过相似, 判决结果很难预测.

sentences.en: Where the parties fail to reach an agreement, the Patent Office shall adjudicate.
sentences.cn: 双方不能达成协议的, 由专利局裁决.

sentences.en: Would you please adjudicate on who should get the prize?
sentences.cn: 请你评判谁应该得奖好 吗 ?

trans.tran_cn: 判决, 宣判, 裁定
trans.tran_en: to officially decide who is right in a disagreement and decide what should be done

trans.tran_cn: 判决，宣判，当…的评判员（或裁判员、仲裁人）
